contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = X-Ray Vision | Type = Album | Artist = The Moldy Peaches | Cover = Moldypeachesxrayvision.jpg | Released = 1996 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Anti-folk]] | Length = | Label = Average Cabbage Records | Producer = | Reviews = | Last album = | This album = '''''X-Ray Vision''''' <br /> 1996 | Next album = ''[[Fer The Kids/ Live 1998]]'' <br/> 1999 }} '''''X-Ray Vision''''' is a 7", 33â…“ rpm EP released by [[The Moldy Peaches]]. There are three copyright dates listed on the album: 1994, 1995, and 1996. An insert inside the album states that [[Adam Green (musician)|Adam Green]] was the sole member of The Moldy Peaches at the time of the recording. However, future member [[Kimya Dawson]] is listed on the credits of the album and sings lead on "Little Bunny Foo Foo." Each record is numbered and there are 300 copies. ==Track listing== # Rap Sux! # Little Bunny Foo Foo # On Top # I Wish I Was Ben Lee # Flea Circus # Moldy Peaches in Da House # Punching Bag {{DEFAULTSORT:X-Ray Vision (Album)}}{{The Moldy Peaches}} [[Category:1996 debut albums]] [[Category:The Moldy Peaches albums]] {{1990s-folk-album-stub}}
